abstract: Bank of America‘s investment banking arm has hired a former dealmaker from Sprint Nextel as its global head of telecom mergers and acquisitions. Marc Montagner joins Banc of America Securities after serving as head of mergers and acquisitions at Sprint Nextel, formed through a $35 billion merger in 2005. Before Sprint Nextel, he was an investment banker at Morgan Stanley.
